ygData.subject: Happenings
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I hit 13th last night. FINALLY! I got tired of running from Fire Elementals in Lavastorm and went to Befallen and camped Lrodd.  I noticed that after
ygData.messageBody:
Well I hit 13th last night. FINALLY!
I got tired of running from Fire Elementals in Lavastorm
and went to Befallen and camped Lrodd. I noticed that
after killing him a few times at a yellow con, he
started conning even a few times and then blue. I guess
there is some anti camp code that makes him a weaker
spawn, or it could be a set cycle. <shrug>
3 very kewl things happened to me there.
A high level shaman cast shrink on me! That was so
kewl. No ducking the entire time I was there, and I FLEW
through everything.
A 34th level druid cast Regeneration on me. That was
awesome! I was at 1/4 bub of health after fighting
Lrodd (didn't use HT once since I was camping him :) )
and I went up to full in a very short amount of time
instead of the 10+ minutes I normally spend healing. It
also lasted through 3 more fights with Lrodd and other
assorted denezines of Befallen.
That same Druid killed the Elf Skeleton (Red to me) and
got the Thex Mallet shaft and then gave it to me. He
said he was on another quest and didn't need it. I have
no idea if I can even comlete the quest, but I will look
that up shortly. Heh.
Anyone alive out there?

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
13th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
